text: Scientific classification may refer to: * Chemical classification * Mathematical classification, construction of subsets into a set * Statistical classification, the mathematical problem of assigning a label to an object based on a set of its attributes or features * Taxonomy, the practice and science of categorization ==Biology== * Alpha taxonomy, the science of finding, describing and naming organisms * Biological classification * Cladistics, a newer way of classifying organisms, based solely on phylogeny * Linnaean taxonomy, the classic scientific classification system * Virus classification, naming and sorting viruses ==Astronomy== * Galaxy morphological classification * Stellar classification ==See also== * Categorization, general * Classification of the sciences (Peirce) * Linguistic typology * Systematic name
title: Scientific classification (disambiguation)
